pr_title: docs: [7.x][apm] link to master in n.x branches

timeline.message: docs: [apm] link to master in n.x branches

timeline.bodyText: Hmm, this worked when I tested locally but doesn't seem to resolve correctly in the ci check.
timeline.author: bmorelli25
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -73,3 +73,11 @@ Shared attribute values are pulled from elastic/docs
 ///////
 
 include::{asciidoc-dir}/../../shared/attributes.asciidoc[]
+
+///////
+APM does not build n.x documentation. Links from .x branches should point to master instead
+///////
+ifeval::[{source_branch} == 7.x]

timeline.bodyText:
Ahh, maybe this:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            ifeval::[{source_branch} == 7.x]
          
          
            
            ifeval::["{source_branch}"=="7.x"]
timeline.author: bmorelli25
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -73,3 +73,11 @@ Shared attribute values are pulled from elastic/docs
 ///////
 
 include::{asciidoc-dir}/../../shared/attributes.asciidoc[]
+
+///////
+APM does not build n.x documentation. Links from .x branches should point to master instead
+///////
+ifeval::[{source_branch} == 7.x]

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -73,3 +73,11 @@ Shared attribute values are pulled from elastic/docs
